en.name: Subscription
en.description: Sell an item with a single click. Great for preorders.
en.longdescription: Just need to sell one thing? Set up a simple single purchase element for the commerce item of your choice.
en.instructions: For physical goods, define regions and shipping costs.

is.name: Stök kaup
is.description: Seldu hlut með einum smelli. Frábært fyrir forpantanir
is.longdescription: Þarftu bara að selja einn hlut? Settu upp einfalda kaup einingu fyrir stök kaup á hlut af þínu vali.
is.instructions: Fyrir formfasta hluti skal skilgreina svæði og sendingarkostnað.

cn.描述: 单击卖出一件商品. 对预售非常好.
cn.详细描述: 只要卖一件东西? 为你所选的商品设置一个简单的单件购买元素.
cn.指示: 对于物理商品，定义区域和运费.

en.unavailable: Sorry, this item is currently unavailable.

is.unavailable: Afsakið, þessi hlutur er ekki í boði þessa stundina.

cn.unavailable: 对不起, 该商品暂时没有.

description.en: Choose a subscription plan for this jammy.
description.is: Veldu hlut úr birgðaskrá til að selja og verslunar tengingu sem skal nota.

cn: 为此果酱选择一个订阅计划

description.en: Choose one or more subscription plans for this element
description.is: Choose one or more subscription plans for this element

cn: 为此元素选择一个或多个订阅计划
添加一个新的订阅计划
为订阅者添加提要条目

description.en: Add a feed item to appear for subscribers on element login
description.is: Add a feed item to appear for subscribers on element login

cn: 为在元素登陆上的订阅者添加要显示的提要条目

placeholder.en: Description copy for the feed item
placeholder.is: Description copy for the feed item

description.en: Customize messages shown to people using this element.
description.is: Sérsníða skilaboð sem sýnd eru fólki sem nota þessa einingu.

cn: 定制显示给使用本元素的人的信息.

default.en: Thank you for signing up. Please check your inbox to verify your email & complete your subscription.

cn: 谢谢注册. 请查看你的收信箱来验证你的电子邮箱 & 完成你的订阅.

default.en: Thank you for signing up. Please make sure to verify your address here to complete your subscription.

cn: 谢谢注册. 请确保验证你的地址 here 来完成你的订阅.

default.en: There was a problem with your payment. Please try again.

cn: 你的付款有问题. 请重新再试.
密码重设电子邮件信箱

default.en: Default password reset email message with {{{verify_link}}}

cn: 默认密码重设电子邮件信息通过 {{{verify_link}}}
